about_the_game:
＜About＞
Water Festa is a top-down shooter inspired by Thailand's Songkran water festival. You control a mermaid on land, balancing wetness to remain human. Players dodge water to avoid becoming too wet, but seek it when dry. Expect a casual bullet hell experience as people continuously shower you.

＜Battles＞
In this game, you wield a water gun fueled by your power. Maneuvering through the game, you dodge excess water but seek hydration when needed. This mechanic offers a more forgiving gameplay compared to traditional bullet hell games.

As a mermaid exploring land during the festival, you face a unique challenge.ฤs a mermaid girl, balancing wetness to remain human, dodge water to avoid becoming too wet, but seek it when dry. Stay cautious amid the festivities to ensure a successful adventure.


Enjoy traveling the land and have fun!
